author: cutting
msg: HADOOP-386.  When removing excess DFS block replicas, remove those on nodes with the least free space first.

author: kahatlen
msg: The attached patch (derby-1563.diff) fixes the problem by waiting
before checking if the file exists.

author: cutting
msg: HADOOP-375.  Permit multiple datanodes to run on a single host.  Contributed by Devaraj.

author: ajith
msg: 1.Modified the skeleton generation in the following way

I. Enabled the server side skel generation only when the user has asked for the service descriptor with the interface option, Hence -ss -sd -ssi generates service.xml, concrete skel, and the skel intefrace, -ss -ssi generates the service.xml with the interface only and the -ss -sd  and just -ss generates the usual concrete skel.

author: jeremias
msg: Attempt to make grayscale patterns look nicer when using PCL commands. The standard PCL shades are very coarse and I replaced them with a simple 4x4 bayer dither pattern defined as a user-defined pattern in PCL.
Current side-effect: Darker gray values will result in almost black output on some printers (at least on mine).
